grape.embiggen.utils.parameter_validators.validate_verbose module

grape.embiggen.utils.parameter_validators.validate_verbose.validate_verbose(candidate_verbose)[source]

Return validated verbose candidate, raising a meaningful error otherwise.

Parameters

candidate_verbose (Union[bool, int],) – The candidate verbose value to validate.

Raises

ValueError, – If the provided verbose parameter is not within the allowed set of values.

Returns

Return type

The validated value.

Return type

bool

Return validated window size candidate, raising a meaningful error otherwise.

Parameters

size (candidate_window) – The candidate window size value to validate.

Raises
